## Properties

| Property            | Attribute   | Description                       | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------- | ----------- | --------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `href` _(required)_ | `href`      | URL to where the link should lead | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `target`            | `target`    |                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `underline`         | `underline` |                                   | `boolean` | `true`      |
